description:
Course Updated 31 January 2016

Why are 18,946 students wanting me to mentor them in 38 Udemy courses? 18,946 students have started learning from me since August 7th 2015. Shouldn't you find out why?

You are about to learn how to work with HTML and CSS and create websites from scratch. I am a native English speaker so you will be able to understand me easily as I teach you step by step how to create a website from the very beginning

In this course, we will create a website for a sample law business right from the beginning. You will get to start with a blank page and, with step by step instructions, create a complete website. You can then take what you have learnt and offer to build websites for clients (potentially earning thousands of dollars if you do it correctly!)

You will learn how to create your first html document and learn how to correctly use CSS.

You will also discover how to work with sub menus and learn how to add CSS to sub menus as well.

Discover how to work with images and ensure that they fit correctly on your website.

You will even create the Contact Us section, add telephone numbers and even social media links to your website.

Also included is the ability to add contact forms and how to create additional pages and links on your website.

Take this course today - you are covered by a full 30 day money back guarantee.
title: HTML and CSS: Create Complete Websites for Fun and Profit
